com.microsoft.bingads.bulk

Class BulkFileWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.bingads.bulk.BulkFileWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class BulkFileWriter
extends Object
implements Closeable
    Provides methods to write bulk entities to a file.

    • Method Detail

      • writeEntity

        public void writeEntity(BulkEntity entity,
                        boolean excludeReadonlyData)
                 throws IOException
        Writes the specified entity to the file.
        • Single Line Entity: Writes single line to describe content
        • Multi Line Entity: Writes lines to describe the entity and all its children
        Parameters:
        entity - a bulk entity to be written to file
        excludeReadonlyData - indicates whether readonly data (such as errors, performance data etc.) should be excluded when writing to file
        Throws:
        IOException

      • writeEntity

        • Single Line Entity: Writes single line to describe content
        • Multi Line Entity: Writes lines to describe the entity and all its children
        Parameters:

        Throws:
